sentences.en: It took over three months to hammer out the distributorship agreement.
sentences.cn: 这份代理权合约花了三个多月才敲定.

sentences.en: the UK distributorship for Sol lighting products
sentences.cn: Sol牌照明产品的英国分销商

sentences.en: We are most delighted to be given the sole distributorship in China.
sentences.cn: 我们很高兴成为中国的总供应商.

sentences.en: We await your proposal on distributorship in your country.
sentences.cn: 我们期待着贵公司就贵国代理权问题的提案.

trans.tran_en: a company that has an arrangement to sell the products of another company
